name: Catscratch Dispatch
description:
I left the keys inside the crates. You’ll need to bust them open somehow…

Controls
Up/Down to select a ! Block
Right to extend a ! Block in increments
X to retract a ! Block all at once
R to reset the level

This game is adapted from a course I made in Super Mario Maker 2 (WQS-6KG-F0H).
It is most legible there (and best played there) but presented here for the purposes of accessibility and preservation.

Source Code

The reasoning behind the title is that, in the actual course, the ! Blocks are extended by scratching at them. It isn’t very evident here, haha.
